1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Content map.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Map
6  ( -- * Get & Put
7    CGetPut,
8    gpText, gpList, gpSet, gpSetSort,
9
10    -- * Map
11    contentAp, contentMap,
12    contentApText,
13    contentMapTextList,
14  ) where
15
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                 as O
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Simple        as D
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Complex       as D
19
20
21-- ----------------------  Get & Put
22
23-- | Pair of get and put.
24type CGetPut a c = (c -> a, a -> c)
25
26-- | 'gText' and 'pText'.
27gpText :: (D.CText c) => CGetPut String c
28gpText = (D.gText, D.pText)
29
30-- | 'gList' and 'pList'.
31gpList :: (D.CList c) => CGetPut [c] c
32gpList = (D.gList, D.pList)
33
34-- | 'gSet' and 'pSet'.
35gpSet :: (D.CSet c) => CGetPut [c] c
36gpSet = (D.gSet, D.pSet)
37
38-- | 'gSetSort' and 'pSet'.
39gpSetSort :: (Ord c, D.CSet c) => CGetPut [c] c
40gpSetSort = (D.gSetSort, D.pSet)
41
42
43-- ----------------------  Map
44
45-- | Apply function to internal value of content.
46--
47--   >>> contentAp gText pText reverse (the $ pText "abc") :: BaalaC
48--   VText "cba"
49--
50contentAp :: (c -> a) -> (b -> c') -> (a -> b) -> c -> c'
51contentAp get put f = put . f . get
52
53-- | Map function to internal value of content.
54contentMap :: (Functor f) => (c -> f a) -> (f b -> c') -> (a -> b) -> c -> c'
55contentMap get put f = contentAp get put $ fmap f
56
57-- | Apply function to internal string of text content.
58--
59--   >>> contentApText reverse (the $ pText "abc")
60--   VText "cba"
61--
62contentApText :: (D.CText c) => O.StringMap -> O.Map c
63contentApText = contentAp D.gText D.pText
64
65-- | Map function to characters of internal string of text content.
66--
67--   >>> contentMapTextList (\c -> pText [c]) (the $ pText "abc")
68--   VList [VText "a",VText "b",VText "c"]
69--
70contentMapTextList :: (D.CList c, D.CText c) => (Char -> c) -> O.Map c
71contentMapTextList = contentMap D.gText D.pList
72
